input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

SAMPLEFILE.description: The sample file provided to the pipeline. This is a tab-separated file with one sample per line. Each line should contain a sample id, path to bam file, path to barcodes file (in that order!).

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to FARM locations (i.e. starting with /lustre or /nfs)

reportdir.description: The output directory where the log files will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to FARM locations (i.e. starting with /lustre or /nfs)

barcodes_on_irods.description: Tells pipeline whether to look for the barcodes file on IRODS or the FARM (default true means look on IRODS).

bam_on_irods.description: Tells pipeline whether to look for the bam file on IRODS or the FARM (default true means look on IRODS).

GTF.description: Tells pipeline which genome GTF to use (by default GRCh38 2020A is used).
